errors.mongodb-auth-failed: Could not authenticate to mongodb database
errors.missing-query-key-in-query-json: query property is missing in query JSON
errors.no-search-criteria-submitted: all search field values are empty
errors.non-existent-search-results: no search results exist for the submitted ID
errors.non-existent-record: no record exist for the submitted ID
errors.invalid-field-for-typeahead: Submitted field is not listed for typeahead search
errors.invalid-query-json: Submitted query JSON is not valid
errors.invalid-parameter-value: one of the required parameter has invalid value.
errors.invalid-parameter-value-length: one of the required parameter value is too long
errors.download-type-not-supported: submitted download type is not supported
errors.download-type-format-combination-not-sup: submitted type-format combination is not supported
errors.non-existent-mime-type-for-submitted-for: File format is not mapped to mime type
